name: daily-portfolio
prompt: Daily portfolio report. Run: 1) `botcore get_paper_portfolio` 2) `botcore get_paper_closed_trades` 3) `botcore get_paper_open_trades`. Create a report (under 1500 chars) with: balance, daily PnL, win rate, closed trades today, open positions. Then send it to Telegram by running `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the report text.
